ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package skinless, boneless chicken breasts
2 cups tomato sauce, or to taste

cookingTips: Use fresh mozzarella cheese for best melting and flavor
Arrange chicken in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet for even cooking
Top with sauce and cheese just before baking to prevent toughening
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through a quick, simplified approach to chicken parm that delivers restaurant quality results.
